game.name: Overtrick
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A trick-taking roguelike with style! Outplay your rivals, purchase special abilities, and dazzle 1920s high society with your unstoppable cardplay. Call your contract, follow suit, flush trumps, and claim the hand. This isn't your grandma's bridge club... this is Overtrick!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A trick-taking roguelike with style! Outplay your rivals, purchase special abilities, and dazzle 1920s high society with your unstoppable cardplay. Call your contract, follow suit, flush trumps, and claim the hand. This isn't your grandma's bridge club... this is Overtrick!
